CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc East Rovers?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc East Rovers is arc {Cherylberg Sharks}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Cherylberg Sharks?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Cherylberg Sharks is arc {East Rovers}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Rebeccaview Dolphins} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {New Chiefs} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Cherylberg Sharks to East Rovers in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from New Chiefs to East Rovers in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and Cherylberg Sharks in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and Cherylberg Sharks is {340}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Cherylberg Sharks and Rebeccaview Dolphins in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Cherylberg Sharks and Rebeccaview Dolphins is {295}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Cherylberg Sharks?
SC.A: The total flow output from Cherylberg Sharks is {784}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by New Chiefs?
SC.A: The total flow input by New Chiefs is {1121}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 437? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {517} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {New Chiefs}, a flow of {460} from {New Chiefs} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 238? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {221} from {East Rovers} to {Cherylberg Sharks}, a flow of {189} from {Cherylberg Sharks} to {New Chiefs}, a flow of {150} from {New Chiefs} to {Cherylberg Sharks}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 275 and 317? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {295} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {Cherylberg Sharks}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from East Rovers to Cherylberg Sharks or from New Chiefs to East Rovers?
NC.A: The flow from {New Chiefs} to {East Rovers} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from New Chiefs to Rebeccaview Dolphins, from Cherylberg Sharks to East Rovers, or from New Chiefs to East Rovers?
NC.A: The flow from {New Chiefs} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Cherylberg Sharks}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {New Chiefs} and {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Rebeccaview Dolphins, Arc New Chiefs, Arc Cherylberg Sharks, Arc East Rovers}.
